job_title: At Home Volunteer in London, England
pros: Simply, IHF does incredible things. The welfare and development of the children is always at the forefront of everything done within IHF ; this genuine approach is built on the foundations instilled by founder, Carol, and a view seemingly shared all the generous volunteers (at home and at centre). You will learn a lot if you ever choose to become a part of the IHF team and meet some truly lovely and selfless  people.
cons: I don’t have any to report !
